statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.AddressID , AA.PostalCode , AA.City , AA.StateProvince , AA.Country , AA.AddressLine1 , AA.AddressLine2
FROM IKBIZ.dbo.BMAddress AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.PostalCode LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.City LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.StateProvince LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Country LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.AddressLine1 LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.AddressLine2 LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.PostalCode , AA.City , AA.StateProvince , AA.Country , AA.AddressLine1 , AA.AddressLine2
FROM dbo.BMAddress AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BMAddress ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, PostalCode, City, StateProvince, Country, AddressLine1, AddressLine2 ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #PostalCode#, #City#, #StateProvince#, #Country#, #AddressLine1#, #AddressLine2# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BMAddress SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, PostalCode = #PostalCode# , City = #City# , StateProvince = #StateProvince# , Country = #Country# , AddressLine1 = #AddressLine1# , AddressLine2 = #AddressLine2# WHERE ID = #ID#
